title: Initialize new app baseline with themed landing page

requirements.summary: Create a clean landing screen with app title, tagline, and a primary CTA button with placeholder behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: App loads successfully and displays a single coherent landing screen without errors.
All user-facing text on the landing page is in English.
Landing page includes: title, tagline/description, and one primary button with placeholder behavior (e.g., no-op or disabled) that does not break the app.

file_operations.description: Create the root App component rendered by frontend/src/main.tsx that shows a single landing screen with English title, tagline, and a primary CTA button that is safe (no-op/disabled) and cannot crash the app. Use Tailwind utility classes for layout and spacing; if using shadcn-ui (from the selected shadcn-ui component) for the button/container styling, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Update the document title to match the displayed app name/title on the landing page, keeping all user-facing text in English.

requirements.summary: Define and apply a cohesive Tailwind-based theme (warm/neutral palette, typography, spacing) consistently across the landing page, avoiding blue/purple as primary colors.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page uses a consistent color palette, typographic scale, and spacing system.
Theme avoids blue/purple as the primary palette.
UI styling is implemented with Tailwind and existing UI components composed without modifying immutable UI component source files.

file_operations.description: Create the global stylesheet imported by frontend/src/main.tsx with Tailwind directives and theme tokens (CSS variables) that define a cohesive warm neutral palette (avoiding blue/purple as primary), typographic defaults, and consistent spacing. Keep styling Tailwind-driven and avoid editing any immutable UI component source files.

Apply the theme consistently in the landing UI using Tailwind classes (typographic scale, spacing rhythm, and component styling). If composing existing shadcn-ui components for consistent styling, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and render both on the landing page as static assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
Landing page displays both images without routing them through the backend.
Images render correctly in production build (static asset paths resolve).

file_operations.description: Add the generated static hero background image asset at the exact required path: frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png.
Add the generated static app mark/logo asset at the exact required path: frontend/public/assets/generated/app-mark.dim_512x512.png.

Render both static images on the landing page (hero background and app mark) by referencing the exact generated files in frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/app-mark.dim_512x512.png, ensuring they are served as static assets (no backend involvement). If using any existing UI components for image framing/layout, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
